title: Israel vows to increase Gaza strikes until there is "total, long-term quiet" amid barrage of Palestinian rocket fire
content:
1. Israel vows to increase Gaza strikes until there is "total, long-term quiet" amid barrage of Palestinian rocket fire  CBS News
  2. Protests break out across US as violence escalates between Israel and Hamas  Fox News
  3. 48 killed in Gaza, 5 killed in Israel as UN warns conflict could turn into 'full-scale war'  CNN
  4. Hamas missile hits army jeep, killing soldier; IDF strikes group's top leaders  The Times of Israel
  5. ‘The Skunk’: Another Israeli weapon for collective punishment  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Israel vows to increase Gaza strikes until there is "total, long-term quiet" amid barrage of Palestinian rocket fire  CBS News
Protests break out across US as violence escalates between Israel and Hamas  Fox News
48 killed in Gaza, 5 killed in Israel as UN warns conflict could turn into 'full-scale war'  CNN 
Hamas missile hits army jeep, killing soldier; IDF strikes group's top leaders  The Times of Israel
‘The Skunk’: Another Israeli weapon for collective punishment  Al Jazeera English

localize.title: イスラエルは、パレスチナ人によるロケット弾の乱射が続く中、「完全かつ長期的な静寂」が訪れるまでガザへの攻撃を強化することを宣言。
以色列发誓要增加对加沙的打击，直到在巴勒斯坦的火箭弹袭击中出现 "全面、长期的平静"。
以色列發誓要增加對加沙的打擊，直到在巴勒斯坦的火箭彈襲擊中出現 "全面、長期的平靜"。
